name: Quatter
description:
Quatter was created in celebration of the 25th anniversary of Blaise Müller's Quarto using the Urho3D game engine.

There are sixteen pieces, each with four properties. Players take turns choosing a piece which the other player then places on the board. Line up four pieces - or form a two by two block - with at least one common property to win the game.

Controls Action Keyboard Controller Rotate camera WASD Left or Right Stick Zoom camera Q and E Left and Right Trigger Pick or Put Piece Space 🞩 Selection Arrow Keys D-Pad Select nearest Tab Select
Restart Esc Start (+ Select) Music M, + and -
Screenshot 9
Source

As with all LucKey productions, Quatter's source code is available through GitLab.
